name: Geneva Union
startIntroPart1: As a peaceful nation, we persisted through the big war. Even though we remained neutral, we had to face insurgencies, nuclear fallout and territorists. We lost a lot of land, people and resources. Now that the fallout is mostly overcome and most of Europe emerges again after the Chaos, it is your job to lead this fractured nation and restore it to peace and prosperity once more
uniques: Land units may cross [Mountain] tiles after the first [Great Farmer] is earned
